Ingredient_en: Sheep’s back skin from which the hair has been removed
remove the hair and wash. Cook until tender. Cut up into sashuq
finely ground prepared mandarin orange peel
muxiang [root of Vladimiria souliei or Saussurea lappa]
Solomon’s seal [Polygonatum cirrhifolium or P. multiflorum] paste
Chinese asparagus [Asparagus lucidus or A. cojinjinensis] paste
